TypeSignature.Value: public interface IDesignTimeDbContextFactory<out TContext> where TContext : DbContext
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignTimeDbContextFactory`1<(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContext) + TContext>

Docs.summary: A factory for creating derived instances. Implement this interface to enable design-time services for context types that do not have a public default constructor. At design-time, derived instances can be created in order to enable specific design-time experiences such as Migrations. Design-time services will automatically discover implementations of this interface that are in the startup assembly or the same assembly as the derived context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !TContext CreateDbContext(string[] args) cil managed
Public Function CreateDbContext (args As String()) As TContext

Docs.param: Arguments provided by the design-time service.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of a derived context.
